channel.description: Recent content in java on Technotes

item.title: Packing a Java Application into a Single Jar
item.description: Sometimes I have a little program built in some JVM language. Usually it’s a simple command line utility, maybe something that tests database connectivity via a JDBC connection, a simple JMS utility or a utility analogous to ping but for UDP. The point is, I want to make it easy to set it up and move it from machine to machine. I just want to run it from the command line and have it work.
